entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
